geom_gi.name: 검기 (Sword Qi / 劒氣)
geom_gi.definition: Projecting internal energy (Qi) onto the blade.
geom_gi.visual: A hazy aura extending 1cm to several inches from the blade.
geom_gi.requirement: Requires mastery of Internal Energy (Nae-gong). Marks the entry into 'First Rate'.

geom_gang.name: 검강 (Sword Flux / 劒罡)
geom_gang.definition: Highly compressed and solidified Sword Qi.
geom_gang.visual: A solid, glowing blade of energy (like a lightsaber). Can cut through steel like tofu.
geom_gang.requirement: Requires immense Qi and control. Marks the entry into 'Super Peak' or 'Transformation'.

01_third_rate.name: 삼류 (Third Rate / 三流)
01_third_rate.capability: Physical strength only. No internal energy application.

02_second_rate.name: 이류 (Second Rate / 二流)
02_second_rate.status: Learned internal arts but cannot apply them practically.
02_second_rate.capability: Can mimic forms (Cho-sik) but lacks power. 'Licking the surface'.

03_first_rate.name: 일류 (First Rate / 一流)
03_first_rate.capability: Can control Qi. Capable of 'Sword Qi Injuring Men' (Geom-gi-sang-in).

04_peak.name: 절정 (Peak / 絕頂)
04_peak.status: Top 100 in the Jianghu (Gangho). Elders of minor sects.
04_peak.capability: Perfect Sword Qi (Geom-gi). Can create defensive Qi barriers (Gi-mak).
04_peak.power_gap: Often the limit for talented humans without 'Miraculous Encounters'.

05_super_peak.name: 초절정 (Super Peak / 超絕頂)
05_super_peak.limitation: Using Geom-gang drains stamina rapidly. Can only use it a few times.
05_super_peak.power_gap: Overwhelmingly stronger than Peak (Geom-gang breaks Sword Qi).

06_transformation.name: 화경 (Transformation / 化境)
06_transformation.phenomenon: Metamorphosis (Hwan-gol-tal-tae) - Body reconstructs to optimal state. Rejuvenation (Ban-ro-hwan-dong) begins.
06_transformation.visual: Sword Flux can be shaped (e.g., orbs) or separated from the blade.

07_profound.name: 현경 (Profound / 玄境)
07_profound.capability: Refined Sword Flux. Massive scale (e.g., dozens of Qi spheres).
07_profound.visual: Nature Unity (Ja-yeon-dong-hwa). Their presence might disappear or feel like the universe itself.

08_life_and_death.name: 생사경 (Life and Death / 生死境)
08_life_and_death.capability: Mind Sword (Sim-geom) - Cutting with thought alone. Flying (Deung-seon).
08_life_and_death.role: Deus Ex Machina. Usually leaves the mortal world (Ascension).

narrative_usage.power_cliff: The gap between Peak (Geom-gi) and Super Peak (Geom-gang) is often depicted as an insurmountable wall.
narrative_usage.growth_event: Crossing from Peak to Transformation usually involves a life-or-death crisis or consuming a Legendary Elixir (e.g., Gongcheong-seokyu).
